code: import React,{useState}from"react";import Header from"./components/Header";import Filters from"./components/Filters";import Dashboard from"./components/Dashboard";import EVTypeChart from"./components/Charts/EVTypeChart";import RangeChart from"./components/Charts/RangeChart";import Footer from"./components/Footer";import LocateMap from"./components/LocateMap";import data from"./data/evData.json";import"./styles/dashboard.css";import{motion}from"framer-motion";import{APIProvider}from"@vis.gl/react-google-maps";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const App=()=>{const[filteredData,setFilteredData]=useState(data);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Header,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-4 gap-6 mt-6",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(motion.div,{initial:{opacity:0,y:-10},animate:{opacity:1,y:0},transition:{duration:0.3},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Filters,{data:data,setFilteredData:setFilteredData})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-4 md:col-span-3 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(EVTypeChart,{data:filteredData})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chart-card",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(RangeChart,{data:filteredData})})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-4 md:col-span-3 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Dashboard,{data:filteredData})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-4 md:col-span-3 grid grid-cols-1 md:grid-cols-2 gap-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(APIProvider,{apiKey:process.env.REACT_APP_GOOGLE_MAPS_API_KEY,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LocateMap,{data:filteredData})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-span-4 grid grid-cols-2 md:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-6 mt-6",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Footer,{})})]})]});};export default App;
